item.title: European markets trade lower as central banks take center stage
item.description: European markets trade lower Tuesday as central banks take center stage this week.

item.title: Nvidia falls deeper into correction territory as Broadcom rally continues
item.description: Despite Nvidia's recent fall, its stock is still up more than 160% for the year. Broadcom has risen more than 120% in the same time frame.

item.title: UK kicks off review into training AI models on copyrighted content
item.description: The U.K. government said Tuesday it's consulting on measures to regulate the use of copyrighted content by tech companies to train their AI models.

item.title: Dow futures fall 100 points after index notches longest losing streak since 2018: Live updates
item.description: The 30-stock Dow slid for an eighth session on Monday, marking its longest run of losses since 2018.

item.title: Indonesia's protectionist policies aimed at attracting tech investment may backfire, economists warn
item.description: "I call it pseudo-protectionism," said Bhima Yudhistira, executive director of the Center of Economic and Law Studies.
